content.description: Start as low as you dare on the overhanging face and make several very powerful moves on wide pinches into the start of Viagra.
content.location: The center of the obvious overhanging face on the boulder directly north (downhill) of the spire.

content.description: Start on the two best pinches you can find at the top of the overhanging section and throw to the ledge over the lip. Make a few easier moves through an incut sidepull and a flat jug to rock up onto the slab.
content.location: The center of the obvious overhanging face on the boulder directly north (downhill) of the spire.

content.description: Work your way up the left-ish side of the slab using interesting holds. A sit start adds a couple fun moves without changing the grade.
content.location: The west face of the tall boulder just to the west of the spire.

content.description: Start as low as you can in the crack to the left of Viagra and work your way up the detached block. This problem would probably warrant another star if it wasn't so low to the ground.
content.location: Just to the left of Viagra, deep in the crack.

content.description: The prominent "spire" formation which can be seen from the top of the cliff, a couple hundred yards down the talus.
